response.overview: Em is a young actress on the verge of a promising career, but her struggles with Obsessive Compulsive Disorder threaten her dreams.  When her career begins to take off and a budding romance enters her life, Emâ€™s intrusive thoughts grow louder,  intruding on her ability to receive the things she most desires; a successful career and meaningful relationship. Afraid of rejection and ridicule, Em is determined to hide her symptoms rather than open herself to help. With a real chance at happiness before her, can she overcome her fears to seize it?
response.title: Counting
